member.name: P:Syslog.Settings.UdpPort
member.summary: UDP port on which to listen2. Valid range: 0-65535.
member.exception: Thrown when value is not between 0 and 65535.

member.name: P:Syslog.Settings.DisplayTimestamps
member.summary: Flag to enable or disable displaying timestamps.

member.name: P:Syslog.Settings.LogFileDirectory
member.summary: Directory in which to write log files. Cannot be null or empty.
member.exception: Thrown when value is null or empty.

member.name: P:Syslog.Settings.LogFilename
member.summary: Log filename. Cannot be null or empty.
member.exception: Thrown when value is null or empty.

member.name: P:Syslog.Settings.LogWriterIntervalSec
member.summary: Number of seconds between each log file update. Valid range: 1 or greater.
member.exception: Thrown when value is less than 1.

member.name: M:Syslog.Settings.ToString
member.summary: Human readable representation of the object.
